categories: Category:Battles of the Early rebellion against the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: In the aftermath of the Battle of Dac City in 18 BBY[source?] on Mon Cala, Imperial Colonel Bergon's sky-base was attacked in the planet's northern hemisphere by a squad of Mon Calamari aquatic vehicles led by Commander Gial Ackbar. The attack resulted in the destruction of the sky-base, and the further escalation of engagements on the planet.
